text: "What I'm For" is a song recorded by American country music artist Pat Green. It was released in April 2009 as the third single and title track from the album What I'm For. The song reached #28 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart. The song was written by Marc Beeson and Allen Shamblin. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (2009) !align="center"|Peak position |- |} ==References== Category:2009 singles Category:2009 songs Category:Pat Green songs Category:Songs written by Marc Beeson Category:Songs written by Allen Shamblin Category:Song recordings produced by Dann Huff Category:BNA Records singles
title: What I'm For (song)
